mapper.sql: id, ftype, projectid, amount,balance, remark, operator, opttime, creator, createtime,shopid
mapper.select: SELECT sum(case when ftype='in' then amount else amount*-1 end) from t_erp_fin_journalaccount where shopid=#{shopid,jdbcType=CHAR} and ftype in ('in','out')

SELECT sum(p.payprice*-1) from t_erp_purchase_form_payment p left join t_erp_purchase_form_entry e on e.id=p.formentryid left join t_erp_purchase_form form on form.id=e.formid where form.shopid=#{shopid,jdbcType=CHAR} and p.auditstatus=1

SELECT
date_format(createtime, '%m-%d') date,
date_format(subdate(createtime,date_format(createtime,'%w')), '%m-%d') date,
date_format(createtime, '%Y-%m') date,
sum(case when ftype='in' then amount else 0 end) amount_in, sum(case when ftype='out' then amount else 0 end ) amount_out from ( SELECT t.id,tp.name name,ftype,amount , date_format(createtime, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i') createtime from t_erp_fin_journalaccount t left join t_erp_fin_project tp on tp.id=t.projectid where t.shopid=#{shopid,jdbcType=CHAR} and createtime >=#{fromDate,jdbcType=DATE} and createtime <=#{endDate,jdbcType=DATE} and t.ftype in ('in','out') union select p.id, tp2.name name, case when p.payprice>0 then 'out' else 'in' end ftype, case when p.payprice < 0 then p.payprice*-1 else p.payprice end amount, date_format(p.createdate, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i') createtime from t_erp_purchase_form_payment p left join t_erp_fin_project tp2 on tp2.id=p.projectid left join t_erp_purchase_form_entry e on e.id=p.formentryid left join t_erp_purchase_form form on form.id=e.formid where form.shopid=#{shopid,jdbcType=CHAR} and p.auditstatus=1 and p.createdate >=#{fromDate,jdbcType=DATE} and p.createdate <=#{endDate,jdbcType=DATE} ) V
where V.name like #{search,jdbcType=CHAR}
group by date_format(createtime, '%Y-%m-%d')
group by date_format(subdate(createtime,date_format(createtime,'%w')), '%m-%d')
group by date_format(createtime, '%Y-%m')

SELECT date_format(createtime, '%Y-%m-%d') date ,sum(case when ftype='in' then amount else 0 end) amount_in, sum(case when ftype='out' then amount else 0 end ) amount_out , sum(case when ftype='in' then amount else 0 end)-sum(case when ftype='out' then amount else 0 end ) amount_rest from t_erp_fin_journalaccount where shopid=#{shopid,jdbcType=CHAR} and ftype in ('in','out') group by date_format(createtime, '%Y-%m-%d')
